properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Sandy Point to North Beach MD; Chester River to Queenstown MD; Eastern Bay; Chesapeake Bay from Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 12:44AM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet. For the Small Craft
Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Chester River to Queenstown MD, Chesapeake Bay from
Pooles Island to Sandy Point MD, Chesapeake Bay from Sandy
Point to North Beach MD and Eastern Bay.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 6 PM EST
this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM EST THIS EVENING
